title: Why is US stock market down today? Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq all in red — Is Fed rate-cut expectation holding investors back?
description: US stock market down today: The US market slipped early as the Dow fell to 47,847, the S&P 500 eased to 6,847, and the Nasdaq dropped to 23,423. Traders stayed cautious. Tech moved unevenly. Nvidia, Meta, and Tesla gained, but broader sentiment weakened. Inve…
content: US stock market opened mixed on Wednesday. The Dow slipped to 47,847.09, down 35.81 points or 0.07%. The S&P 500 eased to 6,847.37, lower by 2.35 points or 0.03%. The Nasdaq fell to 23,423.41, do… [+4257 chars]
